title: VR-Based Mining Safety Training: Field Hazard Response Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mining industry principles and safety management systems, basic proficiency in VR device operation
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented education structured as 30% theory (online lectures), 60% VR simulations, and 10% discussion/feedback

learning_goals: Learners can identify five major hazard scenarios in mines (collapse, gas leaks, fires, equipment failure, slips) in VR environments and perform response procedures
Learners can apply safety protocols with over 90% accuracy in crisis situations resembling real-world settings after VR training
Learners can propose three improvement strategies for VR training scenarios based on peer assessment and instructor feedback
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
